Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time spent on 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average time between 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Time difference between 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average resolution time of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time taken for 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' across all cases
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Time difference between 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average waiting time before 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' is initiated
Metric: The average of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total resolution time for cases involving 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time for a case to be completed after 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' to any subsequent approval activity
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case
